string.text:
Benelli M4 is a unique Auto Regulating Gas-Operated (A.R.G.O) semi-automatic shotgun designed by Benelli Armi S.p.A.
 This weapon features a Picatinny rail, fully adjustable ghost-ring aperture rear sight and windage-adjustable front sight.
 The steel components of the weapon have a matte black phosphated corrosion resistant finish while the aluminium parts are matte hard-anodized.
 This specific model includes a fixed stock and tritium night sights.
 %c[ui_gray_3]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes for Picatinny rail.
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] SilencerCo Salvo® 12.
